column4: HI I have a question about installing compwiz, Just got a new laptop and want to add some flash...
first, do you mean compiz , second if you do mean compiz, flash doesn't have anything to do with it
I know, Bud, your right I meant compiz and not adding flash, i meant adding something flashy...
ok well head over to #ubuntu-xgl, that channel will be more helpfull for compiz and xgl and the like
